00034 int ResponseCallbackLock::response(uint32_t status, uint64_t lockGeneration) {
00035   hbuilder_.initialize_from_request(m_event_ptr->header);
00036   CommBufPtr cbufPtr( new CommBuf(hbuilder_, 16) );
00037   cbufPtr->append_int(Error::OK);
00038   cbufPtr->append_int(status);
00039   cbufPtr->append_long(lockGeneration);
00040   return m_comm->send_response(m_event_ptr->addr, cbufPtr);
